description: The Butterfly Bush (Buddleja 'SMNBDL' PUGSTER AMETHYST) is a flowering shrub full of color and life. Its vibrant purple-amethyst flowers, which bloom in late summer, draw in a variety of butterflies and birds, making them great additions to any garden. They are fast-growing and will readily re-bloom if cut back after flowering. The plant also has strong aroma, making it perfect for putting next to your front porch or backyard patio. Plus, its easy maintenance makes it an ideal choice for gardeners of all levels. This amazing plant will bring beauty and color to your yard for years to come!
